info.name: Ride Booking API
info.description:
The **Ride Booking API** is a comprehensive RESTful API designed for a ride-sharing platform, enabling seamless management of users, drivers, rides, authentication, and statistics. It supports critical functionalities such as user registration, driver onboarding, ride requests, and detailed statistical insights, forming the backbone of a scalable ride-sharing application. The API uses JSON for data exchange, employs standard HTTP methods (GET, POST, PATCH), and is organized into modular folders for clarity and maintainability.

Currently, features like **social login**, **email notifications**, and **file uploads** are not implemented but are planned for integration in the near future. Upcoming enhancements include **improved error handling**, **rate limiting**, **real-time ride tracking**, **payment integration**, **ride rating systems**, **multi-language support**, **push notifications**, **in-app chat support**, and **advanced analytics** to further enhance user experience and platform accessibility. These additions aim to refine and polish the API, ensuring a robust and user-friendly ride-sharing ecosystem.

item.description:
This folder contains endpoints for managing user accounts, including registration, updates, verification, and administrative actions like blocking or deleting users.

- **Create A User (****`POST /user/register`****)**
    
    - Registers a new user with a JSON payload containing `name`, `email`, and `password`. Uses random placeholders for testing purposes. Returns a 201 status with user details on successful registration.
        
- **Update A User (****`PATCH /user/update`****)**
    
    - Updates user details such as `name`, `phone`, and `picture`. Requires a bearer token for authentication and accepts a JSON payload with updated fields. Returns a 200 status with updated user data.
        
- **Verification Request (****`POST /user/verify-request`****)**
    
    - Initiates a verification process by sending a verification code to the user’s email or phone. Requires a bearer token and returns a 200 status with the verification code.
        
- **Verify User (****`POST /user/verify`****)**
    
    - Verifies a user by accepting a JSON payload with a `verificationCode`. Completes the verification process and returns a 200 status with verification status.
        
- **Get All Users (****`GET /user`****)**
    
    - Retrieves a list of all registered users, restricted to admin users via an admin bearer token. Returns a 200 status with user data.
        
- **Get A User (****`GET /user/me`****)**
    
    - Fetches details of the authenticated user. Requires a bearer token and returns a 200 status with user details.
        
- **Block A User (****`PATCH /user/block/:userId`****)**
    
    - Blocks a user account identified by `:userId`, preventing platform access. Restricted to admin users via an admin bearer token. Returns a 200 status on success or 404 if the user is not found.
        
- **Unblock A User (****`PATCH /user/unblock/:userId`****)**
    
    - Unblocks a previously blocked user account identified by `:userId`, restoring access. Restricted to admin users. Returns a 200 status with the updated block status.
        
- **Delete A User (****`PATCH /user/delete/:userId`****)**
    
    - Deletes a user account identified by `:userId` using soft deletion to maintain data integrity. Restricted to admin users. Returns a 200 status with deletion confirmation.

item.description:
- **Admin Login (****`POST /auth/login`****)**
    
    - Authenticates an admin user with a JSON payload containing `email` and `password`. Returns a 200 status with access and refresh tokens, along with admin details.
        
- **Get Admin New Tokens (****`POST /auth/refresh-token`****)**
    
    - Generates new access and refresh tokens for an admin using a valid refresh token. Returns a 200 status with new tokens.
        
- **Admin Logout (****`POST /auth/logout`****)**
    
    - Logs out an admin user, invalidating the current access and refresh tokens. Requires a bearer token and returns a 200 status upon successful logout.

item.description:
- **Driver Login (****`POST /auth/login`****)**
    
    - Authenticates a driver with a JSON payload containing `email` and `password`. Returns a 200 status with access and refresh tokens, along with driver details.
        
- **Get Driver New Tokens (****`POST /auth/refresh-token`****)**
    
    - Generates new access and refresh tokens for a driver using a valid refresh token. Returns a 200 status with new tokens.
        
- **Driver Logout (****`POST /auth/logout`****)**
    
    - Logs out a driver, invalidating the current access and refresh tokens. Requires a driver bearer token and returns a 200 status upon successful logout.

item.description:
This folder manages authentication-related operations, including login and token refresh for users, drivers, and admins.

- **User Login (****`POST /auth/login`****)**
    
    - Authenticates a rider with a JSON payload containing `email` and `password`. Returns a 200 status with access and refresh tokens, along with rider details.
        
- **Get User New Tokens (****`POST /auth/refresh-token`****)**
    
    - Generates new access and refresh tokens for a rider using a valid refresh token. Returns a 200 status with new tokens.
        
- **User Logout (****`POST /auth/logout`****)**
    
    - Logs out a rider, invalidating the current access and refresh tokens. Requires a rider bearer token and returns a 200 status upon successful logout.

item.description:
This folder handles driver-specific operations, including registration, updates, and administrative actions.

- **Create A Driver (****`POST /driver/register`****)**
    
    - Registers a new driver with a JSON payload containing `name`, `email`, `password`, `vehicleNumber`, and `phone`. Returns a 201 status with driver details on successful registration.
        
- **Update A Driver (****`PATCH /driver/update`****)**
    
    - Updates driver details such as `name`, `phone`, `picture`, and `vehicleNumber`. Requires a driver bearer token and returns a 200 status with updated driver data.
        
- **Get All Drivers (****`GET /driver`****)**
    
    - Retrieves a list of all registered drivers, restricted to admin users via an admin bearer token. Returns a 200 status with driver data.
        
- **Get A Driver (****`GET /driver/me`****)**
    
    - Fetches details of the authenticated driver. Requires a driver bearer token and returns a 200 status with driver details.
        
- **Block A Driver (****`PATCH /driver/block/:driverId`****)**
    
    - Blocks a driver account identified by `:driverId`, preventing platform access. Restricted to admin users. Returns a 200 status on success or 404 if the driver is not found.
        
- **Unblock A Driver (****`PATCH /driver/unblock/:driverId`****)**
    
    - Unblocks a previously blocked driver account identified by `:driverId`, restoring access. Restricted to admin users. Returns a 200 status with updated block status.
        
- **Delete A Driver (****`PATCH /driver/delete/:driverId`****)**
    
    - Deletes a driver account identified by `:driverId` using soft deletion. Restricted to admin users. Returns a 200 status with deletion confirmation.

item.name: Ride

response.name: 201: Request A Ride
403: Request A Ride
201: Request A Ride
403: Get Ride History
200: Get Ride History (Use Rider Access Token)
200: Get Ride History(Use Driver Access Token)

item.description:
This folder manages ride-related operations, from requesting to completing or canceling rides.

- **Request A Ride (****`POST /ride/request`****)**
    
    - Initiates a ride request with a JSON payload containing `pickupLocation` and `destinationLocation` (latitude and longitude). Requires a rider bearer token and returns a 201 status with ride details.
        
- **Accept A Ride (****`PATCH /ride/accept/:rideId`****)**
    
    - Allows a driver to accept a ride request identified by `:rideId`. Requires a driver bearer token and returns a 200 status with updated ride status.
        
- **Cancel A Ride (****`PATCH /ride/cancel/:rideId`****)**
    
    - Cancels a ride request identified by `:rideId`. Requires a rider or driver bearer token and returns a 200 status with cancellation details.
        
- **Ride Pick-up (****`PATCH /ride/pickup/:rideId`****)**
    
    - Marks a ride identified by `:rideId` as picked up, indicating the driver has arrived at the pickup location. Requires a driver bearer token and returns a 200 status with updated ride status.
        
- **Ride In-transit (****`PATCH /ride/transit/:rideId`****)**
    
    - Marks a ride identified by `:rideId` as picked up, indicating the driver has arrived at the pickup location. Requires a driver bearer token and returns a 200 status with updated ride status.
        
- **Complete Ride (****`PATCH /ride/complete/:rideId`****)**
    
    - Marks a ride identified by `:rideId` as completed, finalizing the ride process. Requires a driver bearer token and returns a 200 status with completion details.
        
- **Get Ride History (****`GET /ride/:rideId`****)**
    
    - Retrieves the history or details of a specific ride identified by `:rideId`. Requires a rider or driver bearer token and returns a 200 status with ride details or 403 if unauthorized.
        
- Get All Personal Stats **(****`GET /ride/all`****)**

item.name: Stat
item.description:
This folder provides endpoints for retrieving statistical data about users, drivers, and rides.

- **Get User Stats (****`GET /stat/users`****)**
    
    - Retrieves aggregated statistics about all users, including total count, verified users, blocked users, deleted users, riders, drivers, and recent user activity. Restricted to admin users. Returns a 200 status with statistics.
        
- **Get Driver Stats (****`GET /stat/drivers`****)**
    
    - Fetches aggregated statistics about all drivers, including total count, approved drivers, available drivers, suspended drivers, rated drivers, and recent driver activity. Restricted to admin users. Returns a 200 status with statistics.
        
- **Get Rides Stats (****`GET /stat/rides`****)**
    
    - Provides aggregated statistics about all rides, including total rides, recent rides, unique riders and drivers, ride statuses, revenue from completed rides, revenue lost from cancellations, and average revenue per ride. Restricted to admin users. Returns a 200 status with statistics.
        
- **Rider Personal Stat (****`GET /stat/rider-stats`****)**
    
    - Retrieves personalized statistics for the authenticated rider, including total rides, recent rides, unique drivers, ride statuses, total and average fare, and detailed ride history. Requires a rider bearer token. Returns a 200 status with statistics.
        
- **Driver Personal Stat (****`GET /stat/driver-stats`****)**
    
    - Fetches personalized statistics for the authenticated driver, including total rides, recent rides, unique riders, ride statuses, total and average income, and detailed ride history. Requires a driver bearer token. Returns a 200 status with statistics.
